params._initialAnswersRoot: The initial Merkle root of correct answers

returns._0: The latest Quiz struct for the participant

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._answerHashes: Array of keccak256 hashes of the answers

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

answersRoot().notice: The Merkle root of the correct quiz answers

getLatestQuizAttempt(address).notice: Retrieves the latest quiz attempt for a given address

getQuizAttemptCount(address).notice: Retrieves the total number of quiz attempts for a given address

quizAttempts(address,uint256).notice: Mapping to store quiz attempts for each address

startQuiz().notice: Starts a new quiz for the caller

submitQuiz(bytes32[],bytes32[]).notice: Submits quiz answers and calculates the score

updateAnswersRoot(bytes32).notice: Updates the Merkle root of correct answers
